import React, {useState} from 'react' import axios from 'axios'; export default function AddProduct() { const [ProductForm, setProductForm] = useState( { name: "", img: "./img/product-1.png", price: "", description:"", company: "", info: "", } ) const{name, img, price, description, company, info}=ProductForm const handleChange=(e)=>{ const{name, value}=e.target; setProductForm({...ProductForm,[name]:value}) } const handleSubmit=(e)=>{ e.preventDefault(); axios.post('/products',ProductForm) .then((res)=>{ console.log(res) setProductForm( { name: "", img: "./img/product-1.png", price: "", company: "", info: "", }) window.location='/'; }) .catch((err)=>console.log(err)) } return (

Add New Product

Far far away, behind the word mountains, far from the countries Vokalia and Consonantia.
